histogram.name: Fingerprint.Auth.ScanResult
histogram.summary: Tracks the scan result during fingerprint authentication session. It is recorded every time user touches the fingerprint sensor while authenticating (unlock screen, web auth, etc.).

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Enroll.ScanResult
histogram.summary: Tracks the scan result during fingerprint enrollment session. It is recorded every time user touches the fingerprint sensor while enrolling fingerprints (during onboarding or in Chrome OS settings).

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Reset.ResetContextMode
histogram.summary: The mode FPMCU was in when we reset context.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.SetContext.SetContextMode
histogram.summary: The mode FPMCU was in when we set its context.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.SetContext.Success
histogram.summary: Whether setting FPMCU mode succeeded.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.AttemptsCountBeforeSuccess
histogram.summary: Counts the number of fingerprint attempts until successful screen unlock.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.AuthSuccessful
histogram.summary: Counts the number of times that the fingerprint match successfully vs. rejected.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.EnrolledFingerCount
histogram.summary: Counts the number of fingers enrolled by the user.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.Match.Duration.Capture
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took to capture the fingerprint image in the 'match' case.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.Match.Duration.Matcher
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took to run matcher in the 'match' case.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.Match.Duration.Overall
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took between the detection of a finger and the 'match' event being sent to the AP.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.Match.PositiveMatchSecretCorrect
histogram.summary: Whether the hash of the positive match secret read from FPMCU matches the record.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.MatchIgnoredDueToPowerButtonPress
histogram.summary: Whether fingerprint touch was ignored due to parallel power button press.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.MigrationForPositiveMatchSecretResult
histogram.obsolete: Removed 09/2020 as the migration is no longer supported after M85.
histogram.summary: Whether migrating a record to positive match secret succeeded.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.NoMatch.Duration.Capture
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took to capture the fingerprint image in the 'no-match' case.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.NoMatch.Duration.Matcher
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took to run the matcher in the 'no-match' case.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.NoMatch.Duration.Overall
histogram.summary: Measures the time it took between the detection of a finger and the 'no-match' event being sent to the AP.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.ReadPositiveMatchSecret.Success
histogram.summary: Whether successfully read positive match secret from FPMCU when needed.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.RecordFormatVersion
histogram.summary: Format version of a fingerprint template record read from storage.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Unlock.Result
histogram.summary: Tracks the result of the fingerprint authentication attempt on the lock screen.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.UnlockEnabled
histogram.summary: Track whether fingerprint is enabled to unlock the screen, when the user logs in.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Updater.NoUpdate.Duration.Overall
histogram.summary: Measures the total time it takes to run the fingerprint firmware updater when an update was not necessary.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Updater.Reason
histogram.summary: Tracks the fingerprint firmware updater's reason(s) for re-flashing.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Updater.Status
histogram.summary: Tracks the fingerprint firmware updater's overall status.

histogram.name: Fingerprint.Updater.Update.Duration.Overall
histogram.summary: Measures the total time it takes to run the fingerprint firmware updater when an update was necessary.
